posts.post_content:
I am looking to trade for one or more of these Cobbs or towards depending on card/s.   
T206 Ty Cobb Bat Off (Preferably non SC or Piedmont)
T206 Ty Cobb Red Portrait (Preferably non SC or Piedmont)
T206 Ty Cobb Green Portrait
1914/1915 Cracker Jack Ty Cobb

I have a couple low grade 33 Goudey Ruths (SGC 1 #181 and PSA A #149) for trade.  Please send a PM if interested.
